```{r}
flows_emission_data_url<- "https://stats.oecd.org/restsdmx/sdmx.ashx/GetData/IO_GHG_2021/FD_CO2.AUS+AUT+BEL+CAN+CHL+COL+CRI+CZE+DNK+EST+FIN+FRA+DEU+GRC+HUN+ISL+IRL+ISR+ITA+JPN+KOR+LVA+LTU+LUX+MEX+NLD+NZL+NOR+POL+PRT+SVK+SVN+ESP+SWE+CHE+TUR+GBR+USA+ARG+BRA+BRN+BGR+KHM+CHN+HRV+CYP+IND+IDN+HKG+KAZ+LAO+MYS+MLT+MAR+MMR+PER+PHL+ROU+RUS+SAU+SGP+ZAF+TWN+THA+TUN+VNM.AUS+AUT+BEL+CAN+CHL+COL+CRI+CZE+DNK+EST+FIN+FRA+DEU+GRC+HUN+ISL+IRL+ISR+ITA+JPN+KOR+LVA+LTU+LUX+MEX+NLD+NZL+NOR+POL+PRT+SVK+SVN+ESP+SWE+CHE+TUR+GBR+USA+ARG+BRA+BRN+BGR+KHM+CHN+HRV+CYP+IND+IDN+HKG+KAZ+LAO+MYS+MLT+MAR+MMR+PER+PHL+ROU+RUS+SAU+SGP+ZAF+TWN+THA+TUN+VNM.DTOTAL/all?startTime=2018&endTime=2018"

flows_emissions_df <- as.data.frame(readSDMX(flows_emission_data_url),labels=TRUE)

flows_emissions_df_m_1<-flows_emissions_df%>%
  select(COU,PAR,obsValue)%>%
  mutate(x_region=countrycode(COU,origin = "iso3c",destination = "region"))%>%
  mutate(i_region=countrycode(PAR,origin = "iso3c",destination = "region"))%>%
  select(-COU,-PAR)%>%
  group_by(i_region,x_region)%>%
  summarize(obsValue=sum(obsValue))%>%
  pivot_wider(names_from = i_region,values_from = obsValue)

flows_emissions_df_m_2<-flows_emissions_df%>%
  select(COU,PAR,obsValue)%>%
  mutate(x_region=countrycode(COU,origin = "iso3c",destination = "region"))%>%
  mutate(i_region=countrycode(PAR,origin = "iso3c",destination = "region"))%>%
  filter(x_region!=i_region)%>%
  select(-COU,-PAR)%>%
  group_by(i_region,x_region)%>%
  summarize(obsValue=sum(obsValue))%>%
  pivot_wider(names_from = i_region,values_from = obsValue)

write.csv(flows_emissions_df_m_1,"EEITF_Viz/flows_m_1.csv")
write.csv(flows_emissions_df_m_2,"EEITF_Viz/flows_m_2.csv")
```
